Body: I bought Galaxy S Duos2(GT-S7582) from an online store. When I first started my device it was having Free RAM around 170MB,although total(free & including already in use) is 717MB as advertised. I thought prior buying, it'ld have at least 400MB or more free usable RAM.Want to know if it is normal or particularly my device have some problem & need to go service center or approach Store for replacement.Please advice tech gigs (prefrerably S Duos or S Duos 2 owners)
Title: Want to know free ram available on new Galaxy S Duos 2

history.Text: I bought Galaxy S Duos2(GT-S7582) from an online store. When I first started my device it was having Free RAM around 170MB,although total(free & including already in use) is 717MB as advertised. I thought prior buying, it'ld have at least 400MB or more free usable RAM.Want to know if it is normal or particularly my device have some problem & need to go service center or approach Store for replacement.Please advice tech gigs (prefrerably S Duos or S Duos 2 owners)
